User_Comment: This idea for automated recurring invoices based on project milestones is brilliant!
Just downloaded the new mobile update and the receipt scanning is lightning fast now, thank you!
So happy to see the custom P&L comparison view is finally in development.
Dark mode would be a fantastic addition for those of us working late nights during tax season.
The new one-click payroll filing feature has literally saved me hours every week.
Great suggestion to add support for the new challenger banks, would love to see this happen.
An integration with Shopify for real-time inventory syncing would be a game changer for my business.
Really appreciate the team picking up this request so quickly, looking forward to the beta.
I just want to say this community is so helpful and the support team is doing a great job listening to us.
The ability to customize invoice hex codes to match our brand perfectly is a small but wonderful touch.
I completely agree with the OP, a cash flow forecast widget on the dashboard would be incredibly useful.
Excited that you are considering opening up the API for time-tracking apps.
The dashboard redesign looks clean and modern, makes navigating so much more enjoyable.
Love the idea of auto-categorizing expenses based on vendor history, +1 from me!
Glad to hear iPad landscape support is coming soon!
Finally! The ability to handle split payments for employees is exactly what we needed.
This is the best suggestion I've seen all month; multi-currency consolidation is a must-have.
Kudos to the product team for being so transparent with the roadmap recently.
The AI matching for transactions has improved significantly in this latest patch, well done.
Fingers crossed this gets approved, bulk editing invoice due dates would be amazing.
2FA via authenticator app instead of just SMS is a great security proposal.
The new CRM integration is working seamlessly, data flow is perfect.
Thank you for prioritizing the new tax rate updates before the fiscal year end.
I'd love a 'compact view' for lists to see more rows on screen, great idea.
Being able to send estimates directly from the phone app has helped me close deals on site!
I've used Xero and QB before, but the reporting flexibility here is becoming superior.
Automated leave calculation based on hours worked would be a super helpful feature.
Can't wait to try out the new rule creation wizard you mentioned in the dev log.
The speed improvements in the legacy reports are very noticeable, thank you.
Adding a 'Pay Now' button for crypto payments is a forward-thinking suggestion.
Shout out to the support team for clarifying how to use the new tags feature, works like a charm.
The mileage tracker update is spot on, much more accurate now.
Good to see the webhooks for invoice status changes are being built.
A customizable sidebar menu would be great so I can hide modules I don't use.
Exporting reports to Google Sheets directly is a huge workflow improvement for us.
Please build a widget for Android home screens to show current bank balance!
Good to know the team is looking into contractor self-onboarding.
Loving the direction this software is heading, keep up the good work.
Ability to attach documents to bank transfer transactions would be very tidy.
Integration with Slack for notifications is going to be super useful.
The sales tax automation for US states handles the new nexus laws perfectly.
I second the request for multi-language invoice templates for our overseas clients.
The new font is much easier to read on smaller screens, nice choice.
Hoping this drill-down feature gets the green light, it would make audits easier.
Biometric login for the desktop app via mobile auth would be cool.
The migration tool worked flawlessly, moved 5 years of data without a hitch.
Excellent news that OCR for handwritten receipts is being improved.
A visual org chart generated from payroll data would be a fun little addition.
Being able to 'un-reconcile' in bulk has saved me from a massive headache today.
Connecting to project management tools like Asana for billable hours would be ideal.
This forum is such a great resource, thanks everyone for the helpful tips.
Awesome that you are adding the ability to attach large PDF files to invoices soon.
Visual graphs for expense trends over time would be a nice dashboard upgrade.
The new keyboard shortcuts are very intuitive, speeding up my data entry.
Glad you are considering offline mode for the app, essential for rural work.
Allowing employees to update their own address details would reduce admin work nicely.
The bank feed stability has been rock solid lately, no more disconnections!
Thanks for the update on the VAT return filing, looks like it will be ready in time.
Zapier triggers for new contacts would be very powerful.
A 'Sandbox' mode to test features without affecting live data would be incredible.
